1146710.name: Flight Runner Universe
1146710.description:
Flight Runner Universe is a chaotic multiplayer arena game blending aerial combat, vehicular mayhem, and wild game modes into one explosive experience.

  • In Battle Royale, take to the skies and clash on a gravity-warped battlefield. With multiple lives and point-based scoring, every elimination brings you closer to ultimate victory. Outmaneuver, outgun, and outlast.

  • In Beat-em-up Soccer, enter the stadium where goals and knockouts both count. Use weapons, vehicles, and flight powers to brawl your way to victory in the most intense match you've ever played.

  • In Racing Mode, blaze through roads and tracks scattered across the map. Blast your way to the finish using flight boosts and tactical shortcuts.

Choose your mode. Pick your playstyle. Master the skies and dominate the arena.

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
